title: Itinera
description: A mobile app that generates personalized travel itineraries based on user preferences and unique local experiences.
onboardingSubText: Browse personalized itineraries or let us craft the perfect trip based on your interests and travel style.
createSubText: Build your perfect itinerary in minutes. Select activities, set your pace, and let Itinera organize your day with authentic local experiences.
detailSubText: Find activities that match your interests. From historical landmarks to cultural hotspots, discover what makes each destination truly special.
long_description: Itinera is a personalized travel itinerary planner designed for experiential tourism. Travelers select their preferred city and activities, and the system creates a dynamic itinerary using meaningful local experiences uploaded by creators. The app makes trip planning easier while helping users discover authentic and memorable activities in their chosen destination.

title: On The Go
description: A full-stack motorcycle rental platform with booking, business dashboards, subscription plans, and secure payment workflows.
onboardingSubText: Browse premium motorcycles, check availability, and book your dream ride in just a few taps.
createSubText: Turn your motorcycle into income. Create detailed listings with photos, set your rates, and manage bookings through our intuitive business dashboard.
detailSubText: Track bookings, monitor earnings, and grow your motorcycle rental business with powerful analytics and subscription tools designed for owners.
long_description: On The Go is a motorcycle rental web application that enables customers to browse, book, and pay for rentals while business owners manage listings, bookings, and subscriptions. Built using React for the frontend and Express + MySQL for backend operations.

title: ShareBasket
description: A simple grocery list app perfect for families, couples, and friends. It features real-time family sharing so everyone stays updated on what to buy.
onboardingSubText: Create shared grocery lists that sync instantly across all devices. Never miss an item or double-buy again.
createSubText: Add items, organize by category, and check them off as you shop. Our intuitive interface makes list management effortless.
detailSubText: Share your lists with family members instantly. Everyone sees updates in real-time, making grocery shopping a truly collaborative experience.
long_description: ShareBasket is a collaborative grocery list application designed to make shopping easier for families, couples, and groups. It includes a seamless sharing feature that allows multiple users to access and update the same grocery list in real timeâ€”ensuring no item is forgotten and everyone stays in sync. Built with React native, the app provides a clean, intuitive interface with smooth navigation.
